title: PMS 2.0 292 - TNF Preview, Taylor Lewan, Mike Pereira, Steve Levy, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys recap his electric night on WWE NXT, plus look ahead to tonight's Thursday Night game between the Colts and the Titans, and give some insight on the game and why it's tough to make a pick in this game. Also joining Pat and AJ Hawk the show is 3x Pro Bowler, co-host of the Bussin' With the Boys podcast, Tennessee Titans Offensive Tackle, Taylor Lewan. Pat, AJ, and Taylor chat about how his rehab has been going, how he thinks tonight's game is going to go against the Colts, what he thinks needs to change to get Michigan back to the top in college football, and his thoughts on Mike Vrabel (23:53-47:19). Next, former VP of Officiating for the NFL, and current rules analyst on FOX, friend of the program, Mike Pereira joins the show. Pat and Mike chat about the officiating so far this year in the NFL, what he thinks is ultimately making the refs still look bad, some of his favorite stories when getting cussed out by NFL coaches, and much more (52:45-1:15:14). Lastly, 28 year ESPN employee, former SportsCenter anchor, and current member of the booth for Monday Night Football, Steve Levy joins the show. Pat and Steve chat about his time at ESPN, whether he sees the positive or negative reaction from Monday Night Football, what challenges their booth has faced so far this year, and why he's so thankful for his current position (1:15:16-1:41:07). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
